pkgmetadata.longdescription: Unbiased Central Moment Estimates // Calculates one-sample unbiased central moment estimates and two-sample pooled estimates up to 6th order, including estimates of powers and products of central moments. Provides the machinery for obtaining unbiased central moment estimators beyond 6th order by generating expressions for expectations of raw sample moments and their powers and products. Gerlovina and Hubbard (2019) doi:10.1080/25742558.2019.1701917.
